Articles.Content:
It has happened to me a number of times when I click the science instruments and choose transmit, that the last one doesn't work; that is, experiment is performed, pop-up appears with the description texts and buttons to keep, reset or transmit, but when I click transmit, nothing happens. Clicking on the antenna and choosing transmit doesn't help. This is unfortunate with goo cans and science juniors, as the science part becomes inoperable but science points are not granted.

Here's [ksp.log](http://pastebin.com/c5k6RACv)

In science archives, I can see that the said experiment has happened: Materials study from [mun biome] data value 4.00 science 0.00.
